name: OrganizationPolicy
description: Policy for all the users of an organization.

rules.name: OrganizationPolicy-Owner-Rule
rules.description: Allow all the operations on an entity for the owner.

rules.name: OrganizationPolicy-NoOwner-Rule
rules.description: Allow anyone to set the owner of an entity that has no owner set.

rules.name: OrganizationPolicy-ViewPIISampleData-Rule
rules.description: Deny seeing column sample data for table columns tagged with PII.Sensitive.
